{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++23|1=
constexpr auto end()
    requires (!(/*simple-view*/&lt;V&gt; &amp;&amp; /*slide-caches-nothing*/&lt;const V&gt;));
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++23|1=
constexpr auto end() const
    requires /*slide-caches-nothing*/&lt;const V&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns a {{rlp|sentinel}} or an {{rlp|iterator}} representing the end of the {{tt|slide_view}}.

@1@ Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|base_}} and {{rlpi|/#Data members|n_}} be the underlying data members. Equivalent to:
* If {{c/core|V}} models {{rlpsi|#slide-caches-nothing}}, {{c|return iterator&lt;false&gt;(ranges::begin(base_) + ranges::range_difference_t&lt;V&gt;(size()), n_);}}.
* Otherwise, if {{c/core|V}} models {{rlpsi|#slide-caches-last}}, {{c|return iterator&lt;false&gt;(ranges::prev(ranges::end(base_), n_ - 1, ranges::begin(base_)), n_);}}.
* Otherwise, if {{c/core|V}} models {{lconcept|common_range}}, {{c|return iterator&lt;false&gt;(ranges::end(base_), ranges::end(base_), n_);}}.
* Otherwise, {{c|return sentinel(ranges::end(base_));}}.

@@ If {{c/core|V}} models {{rlpsi|#slide-caches-last}}, this function caches the result within the {{rlpi|/#Data members|cached_end_}} for use on subsequent calls. This is necessary to provide the amortized constant-time complexity required by the {{lconcept|range}}.

@2@ Equivalent to {{c|begin() + ranges::range_difference_t&lt;const V&gt;(size())}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A {{rlp|sentinel}} or an {{rlp|iterator}} representing the end of the {{rlpt|/|slide_view}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;ranges&gt;

int main()
{
    static constexpr auto source = {'A', 'B', 'C', 'D'};

    for (const auto subrange: source {{!}} std::views::slide(3))
    {
        std::cout &lt;&lt; "[ ";
        for (auto it = subrange.begin(); it != subrange.end(); ++it)
            std::cout &lt;&lt; *it &lt;&lt; ' ';
        std::cout &lt;&lt; "]\n";
    }
}
|output=
[ A B C ]
[ B C D ]
}}
